author: Justforvisit

text: Wild ARMS has five entries in its main series, two on the PS1 and 3 on the PS2. As well, the first PS1 game was remade for the PS2 and released as Alter-Code-F. Outside of those, there is a tactical-RPG game called Wild ARMS XF for the PSP. So, 7 releases total, 6 unique stories.
